text.div:
HIV Infection (Tests for HIV by Culture and Identification Method)

This value set includes codes from the following code systems:

  • Include these codes as defined in http://loinc.org
    Code Display
    30554-0 HIV reverse transcriptase gene mutations detected [Identifier]
    33630-5 HIV protease gene mutations detected [Identifier]
    34700-5 HIV reverse transcriptase+protease gene mutations tested for
    45175-7 HIV nucleoside reverse transcriptase gene mutations detected [Identifier]
    45176-5 HIV nonnucleoside reverse transcriptase gene mutations detected [Identifier]
    45182-3 HIV phenotype [Susceptibility]
    48558-1 HIV genotype [Susceptibility]
    49573-9 HIV genotype [Susceptibility] in Isolate by Genotype method Narrative
    50790-5 HIV 1 RNA tropism [Identifier]
    53798-5 HIV reverse transcriptase+protease gene mutations detected [Identifier]
    61199-6 HIV 1 integrase gene mutations detected [Identifier]
    6429-5 HIV identified in Blood by Organism specific culture
    6430-3 HIV identified in Semen by Organism specific culture
    6431-1 HIV identified in Unspecified specimen by Organism specific culture
